code: import React from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import{Formik,Form,Field}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';import{showNotification}from'utils/notifications';import GradientButton from'components/Common/gradient-button';export default function AdminHouseDestroyer(){async function destroyHouse(index){await rpc.callServer('Admin-DeleteHouse',index);showNotification('success','Будинок успiшно знищено');}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{index:''},validationSchema:Yup.object({index:Yup.number().required()}),onSubmit:values=>destroyHouse(+values.index)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Form,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Field,{className:"admin_field",type:"number",name:"index",placeholder:"\u043D\u043E\u043C\u0435\u0440 \u0431\u0443\u0434\u0438\u043D\u043A\u0443"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(GradientButton,{type:"submit"},"\u0417\u043D\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0438")));}
